title: Document shell script patterns and conventions
description: Create comprehensive documentation for bash script patterns used in this dotfiles repo

title: Add cross-platform package manager support
description: Support multiple package managers (apt, yum, brew) in Comtrya manifests

title: Improve Docker testing workflow
description: Enhance the Docker-based testing to include more comprehensive validation

title: Add starship prompt configuration
description: Install and configure starship prompt for better shell experience

title: Create chezmoi core configuration files
description: Create .chezmoidata.yaml (versions), .chezmoiexternal.toml.tmpl (nvim git-repo, neovim/lazygit archives for Linux), and .chezmoiignore (exclude Makefile, Dockerfile, README.md, AGENTS.md, .devcontainer, .beads, history)

title: Migrate dotfiles from home/ to chezmoi naming
description: Rename and move: home/.bashrc→dot_bashrc, home/.bashrc.d/→dot_bashrc.d/, home/.bashrc.d/.init.sh→dot_bashrc.d/dot_init.sh, home/.config/→private_dot_config/, home/bin/→bin/ with executable_ prefix, home/.bash_profile→dot_bash_profile, home/.gitconfig→dot_gitconfig, etc. Remove 10-homeshick.sh. Add ~/.local/bin to 10-path.sh

title: Create chezmoi installation scripts
description: Create .chezmoiscripts/ with: run_once_before_00-install-packages.sh.tmpl (apt/brew), run_once_10-install-nvm.sh.tmpl, run_onchange_11-install-nodejs.sh.tmpl, run_once_20-install-pyenv.sh.tmpl, run_once_30-install-starship.sh.tmpl, run_onchange_40-install-screen.sh.tmpl (Linux compile from source). Use templates for OS detection.

title: Update bootstrap.sh for chezmoi
description: Replace Comtrya logic with: chezmoi init --source $SCRIPT_DIR --apply. Keep devcontainer/devpod initialization purpose. Handle both local (--source) and remote (github:rodrigorm) scenarios.

title: Update Dockerfile and Makefile for chezmoi testing
description: Update Dockerfile: remove Comtrya installation, install chezmoi via get.chezmoi.io, run chezmoi init --source /dotfiles --apply. Update Makefile test target if needed. Ensure make test validates the full chezmoi setup.

title: Remove Comtrya artifacts and home/ directory
description: Delete: Comtrya.yaml, entire dev/ directory (all Comtrya manifests), home/ directory (after contents migrated). This is cleanup after migration is verified working.

title: Update README.md with chezmoi instructions
description: Replace Comtrya installation instructions with chezmoi. Document: one-liner install (sh -c "$(curl -fsLS get.chezmoi.io)" -- init --apply rodrigorm), devcontainer usage, what gets installed, structure explanation.
